summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HomeView Pro premium property showcase system. Backend APIs working excellently (94.4% success rate). Frontend functionality tested successfully including user registration, dashboard, property management, and responsive design. Minor issues with dropdown selections in property form.

minor_bugs.issue: Unauthorized access test failed - may not be returning proper 401 status
minor_bugs.impact: Minor security test issue, core functionality unaffected

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not clickable with standard click method

working_features: Landing page with premium design and animations
User registration flow with form validation
Dashboard with statistics and property management

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selection issue in property form - SelectTrigger components need proper click handling. Consider using native select elements or fixing the current shadcn/ui Select component implementation.
